description.value: Regeneration doesn't function while Ctenmiir is exposed to direct sunlight.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

+17 vs AC; 2d10+8 damage (crit 28+4d6, or crit 28+4d10 against Large or larger creatures).

hit.critFormula: 28+4d6, or crit 28+4d10 against Large or larger creatures + @dmgMod

description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Ranged 5/10; +17 vs Reflex; 2d10+7 damage (crit 28+4d6, or crit 28+4d10 against Large or larger creatures).

hit.critFormula: 28+4d6, or crit 28+4d10 against Large or larger creatures + @dmgMod

description.value:
At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard, At-Will

Requires Whelm; Ctenmiir makes a hammer strike attack against one target and a hammer strike or a thrown hammer attack against another target.

Healing

Standard

Trigger: When an adjacent creature becomes bloodied

+15 vs Fortitude; 4d12 damage, and the target is weakened (save ends), and Ctenmiir regains 63 hit points and 1 action point.

Encounter ✦ Thunder, Weapon

Standard

+17 vs AC; 3d10+8 thunder damage (crit 38+4d6, or crit 38+4d10 against Large or larger creatures), and the target is knocked prone.

hit.critFormula: 38+4d6, or crit 38+4d10 against Large or larger creatures + @dmgMod

description.value:
Recharge 6

Ranged 5

+15 vs Will; the target is dominated and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against being dominated (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends). Ctenmiir can have only one creature dominated at a time.

Encounter ✦ Polymorph

Standard

Sustain Minor; Encounter

Ctenmiir becomes insubstantial and gains fl y (hover) 12 until the end of his next turn. Ctenmiir cannot attack while in this form and can remain in this state for 1 hour.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Ctenmiir spends a healing surge to regain 63 hit points. In addition, he gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of his next turn.

system.biography:
HP 254; Bloodied 127
Regeneration 10 (regeneration doesn’t function while Ctenmiir is exposed to direct sunlight)
Resist 10 necrotic Vulnerable 10 radiant Immune disease, poison 		Init +11 | AP 1 | Save +2
AC 31Fort 25Ref 27Will 25
Speed 7, climb 3 (spider climb)
Ability ScoresStr 19 (+10)
Con 15 (+8)		Dex 16 (+9)
Int 12 (+7)		Wis 14 (+8)
Cha 11 (+6)
Languages Common
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Athletics +15, Bluff +11, Intimidate +11, Stealth +14Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 18 | Insight 18

Equipment scale armor , whelm.
